2014/KER/202
HARUN-UL-RASHID, J.
Dated this the 2‚Äù day of January, 2014
ORDER

Petitioner is the accused in S.T.No.1136/2008 on the file
of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-l, Muvattupuzha. The
offence alleged is punishable under Section 138 of the
Negotiable Instruments Act. The petitioner failed to appear
before court on 31/01/2013, the court issued non-bailable
warrant and steps are initiated under Section 82-83 on the
same day. The offence alleged under Section 138 of the
Negotiable Instruments Act is a bailable offence.

3. The petitioner is willing to surrender before the Judicial
First Class Magistrate Court-l, Muvattupuzha. Non-bailable
warrant is pending against her. Now, the petitioner seeks a
direction from this Court to consider her application for bail on
the date of surrender itself.

In the facts and circumstances, the Crl.M.C is disposed of,
directing the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-l,
Muvattupuzha to consider and pass orders on the bail
application on the date of surrender itself in the event of the
petitioner surrendering before the court below and submitting
an application for bail with prior notice to the Assistant Public

bere
Bae
2014/KER/202
Crl.M.C.No. 6 of 2014
2
Prosecutor within a period of three weeks from today. Non-
bailable warrant issued shall be kept in abeyance till the
disposal of the bail application.
Sd/-
HARUN-UL-RASHID, JUDGE.
AV
